title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0001
text: What is the main purpose of self-registration in microservices service discovery?

options.text: To allow services to register themselves with the service registry
To let clients manually register services

explanation: Self-registration allows each service instance to automatically register itself with the service registry when it starts.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0002
text: Which component is responsible for registering a service in self-registration?
explanation: In self-registration, each service instance is responsible for registering itself with the registry.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0003
text: Which of the following best describes the workflow of self-registration?

options.text: Service starts → Registers itself → Sends heartbeats
Client starts → Registers service → Sends requests
Registry starts → Registers all services manually

explanation: In self-registration, the service registers itself with the registry and maintains its status via heartbeats.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0004
text: Which of the following is a common tool that supports self-registration?
explanation: Netflix Eureka supports self-registration, allowing services to register and deregister automatically.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0005
text: Which of the following is a key advantage of self-registration?

options.text: Eliminates the need for a registry

explanation: Self-registration reduces manual configuration by allowing services to register automatically.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0006
text: Which of the following is a disadvantage of self-registration?
explanation: Self-registration increases service complexity because each service must handle registration logic.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0007
text: Which of the following is a key responsibility of a service in self-registration?

options.text: Registering and deregistering itself with the registry

explanation: Each service is responsible for registering and deregistering itself with the registry.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0008
text: Which of the following is a benefit of self-registration for automation?

options.text: Automatically registers services when they start

explanation: Self-registration automates the process of registering services when they start.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0009
text: Which of the following is a benefit of self-registration for scalability?
explanation: Self-registration supports dynamic scaling by allowing new instances to register automatically.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0010
text: Which of the following is a challenge of self-registration?
explanation: In self-registration, the service must handle registration failures and retries.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0011
text: Which of the following is a benefit of self-registration for fault tolerance?
explanation: Self-registration improves fault tolerance by automatically deregistering failed instances.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0012
text: Which of the following is a common health check mechanism used in self-registration?
explanation: Self-registration uses heartbeats or periodic health checks to maintain registry accuracy.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0013
text: Which of the following is a benefit of self-registration for maintainability?

options.text: Reduces manual intervention for service updates

explanation: Self-registration reduces manual intervention by automating service updates in the registry.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0014
text: Which of the following is a benefit of self-registration for reliability?

options.text: Ensures registry always reflects active instances

explanation: Self-registration ensures the registry always reflects active instances through automatic updates.

title: MicroservicesServiceDiscoverySelfRegistration - Q0015
text: Which of the following is a benefit of self-registration for automation?
explanation: Self-registration automates the registration and deregistration of services as they start or stop.

explanation: In self-registration, services must authenticate with the registry to prevent unauthorized registration.
